title: Race Across the Mark (4R168)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Isengard
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Spot a site you control and remove (2) to cancel a skirmish involving an Uruk-hai.
Lore:	”'But in the meantime, the Uruk-hai of Isengard can do the dirty work as usual.'”
Rarity:	R
